channel.title: [HOWTO] Fix tooz connection timeouts with uri
channel.description:
There are optional settings you can add to your coordinator uri to fix errors like socket timeouts.
For redis see: [https://github.com/openstack/tooz/blob/6e7a8508fbcbe9ceacb04490dc8330501bfa2477/tooz/drivers/redis.py#L141](https://github.com/openstack/tooz/blob/6e7a8508fbcbe9ceacb04490dc8330501bfa2477/tooz/drivers/redis.py#L141)
In my specific situation I set my coordinator setting in st2.conf to: ``` [coordination] url = redis://127.0.0.1:6379?socket_timeout=90 lock_timeout = 180 ```
